Posts.EditableText:
I'm currently working  on a gamebook and I had some ideas for minigames, but they would take extra time to make. I'm not sure if they will be worth it so i'm taking a poll. The poll has two options: Yes, the minigames are worth the effort or No , its better to cut the minigames and get the game out faster. I would be very obliged to anyone willing to answer 

http://www.strawpoll.me/11303860
